question: What must Geralt do to obtain White Wolf wine, and what happens after he chooses it during the Wine Wars quest line?
answer: To obtain White Wolf wine, Geralt must end the feud between Liam de Coronata and Matilda de Vermentino in the Blood and Wine expansion's Wine Wars quest line. After completing this task at the end of Wine Wars: Belgaard, he will be asked to return after three days. Upon his return, Geralt is given three options for naming a wine to honor him. If he chooses White Wolf, batches of 5 bottles of the chosen wine are sent weekly to Corvo Bianco, where they can be looted in the cellar.
